EmailTemplate.name: SGN_BRD_Chivas_Brotocal.Email - Registration confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Redeem Your Chivas 12 Shot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for leaving us your details. Present this message with your coupon to redeem your Chivas 12 shot* at the bar.
Let's keep in touch for future Chivas Brotocol happenings.
In the meantime, rock on bros!
* One shot per person, valid on event night only
